entities.name: chamber
entities.description: The chamber is mentioned as the place where someone was caught and expelled.

entities.description: Azkaban is described as a wizard prison.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as the one who expelled someone from the chamber and has valuable Dark Arts stuff.

entities.name: harry

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as someone who is dull and has a conversation with Harry.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is mentioned as the house that Malfoy's father wants to get rid of all Mudblood filth from.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic raided Malfoy's Manor last week.

entities.name: manor
entities.description: Malfoy's Manor was raided by the Ministry of Magic.

entities.name: drawing-room floor
entities.description: There is a secret chamber under the drawing-room floor.

relationships.description: Malfoy expelled someone from the chamber.
